title: FPS Gone CRAZY??
body: So earlier this morning i hop onto League of Legends, i get into a game playing Yasuo support. Immediately i notice a weird kind of lag, i figure "meh it will prob fix itself at the game goes on some file probably didn't load all the way" BOY WAS I WRONG. That whole game my MS/PING stayed the exact same at ~50 BUT my FPS was bouncing from 60 (my normal) down to 6 and back. I wasn't opening and closing anything, i wasn't watching youtubes in the background. So i thought maybe that was just 1 game. So i started a custom game messing around on zed, it was fine for say 3mins? afterwards it went right back to the bouncing of FPS. I would just like to find out if anyone else has experienced this recently, what cause it for them, and how they fixed it. PLZ and TY

replies.body:
You may actually be onto something when you mentioned a file loading incorrectly. Those fps spikes could be caused if a certain asset was corrupted/loaded incorrectly, then every time that asset was used your fps slowly got worse and worse. 

We can try a repair through the client settings, but let's also go through the steps in this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to make sure we hit the common solutions.
I have tried all the solutions in the FPS guide with no luck. Would Initiating a full repair help?

We could try that to help, but we may need to take a little closer look to see what exactly is going on. Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we should be able to get it figured out one on one!

By the way, idk if i just screwed everything up but i used the hextech repair tool and "reinstalled"

AFTER using the hextech tool to get the LoL Logs that i sent with my ticket

You should still be okay. Heck, that reinstall may actually fix the issue as well! If that gets done before we are able to respond to your ticket, check and see if things are working better. If not, we can still help you troubleshoot!

I believe I sent a ticket but just to be sure, https://gyazo.com/ac37b8203472632a77a793d7f8d9d686
Is that what i would look like if i had?
